title: BGMI Anti-Cheat Update – September 2025
excerpt: Stay updated on BGMI's September 2025 Anti-Cheat Update with banned accounts, removed cheats, and enhanced security measures.
content:
Between September 1 and September 30, 2025, BGMI banned 408,992 accounts and removed 1,912 cheating contents. The updated Anti-Cheat system now detects aimbots, wall hacks, speed/recoil modifications, game file manipulation, and skin exploits, ensuring fair and cheat-free gameplay.

All bans were conducted using automated detection combined with manual review for transparency and accuracy. Players are encouraged to join the official BGMI Discord community for detailed stats and ongoing updates.

Stay part of the mission to maintain cheat-free gameplay and enjoy a secure, competitive environment.
